mapper.insert: INSERT INTO item (name, description, price, original_price, category, conditions, status, seller_id, contact_way, location, image_urls) VALUES (#{name}, #{description}, #{price}, #{originalPrice}, #{category}, #{conditions}, #{status}, #{sellerId}, #{contactWay}, #{location}, #{imageUrls})
mapper.update: UPDATE item SET name = #{name}, description = #{description}, price = #{price}, original_price = #{originalPrice}, category = #{category}, conditions = #{conditions}, status = #{status}, contact_way = #{contactWay}, location = #{location}, image_urls = #{imageUrls} WHERE id = #{id}
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM item ORDER BY id DESC
SELECT * FROM item WHERE seller_id = #{sellerId} ORDER BY id DESC
SELECT * FROM item WHERE category = #{category} ORDER BY id DESC
SELECT * FROM item WHERE status = #{status} ORDER BY id DESC
